text: Samuel Sunil Mankhin is a Bangladeshi bishop who has currently serving as the Primate & Archbishop of Dhaka since 2019 of Church of Bangladesh. Mankhin was previously the Bishop of Kustia, serving for many year. Ex officio, he is the Primate of All Bangladesh and the Archbishop of Church of Bangladesh. Category:Anglican archbishops Category:Bangladeshi people
title: Samuel Sunil Mankhin
